title: Cardiology Essentials
summary: Core physiology and pathophysiology concepts for board review.
body: The myocardium relies on coordinated electrical and mechanical cycles. Review coronary perfusion timing, Starling curves, and murmurs associated with valvular lesions.

title: Approach to Infectious Disease
summary: Diagnostic and management pearls for common pathogens.
body: When evaluating fever, start with a focused history covering travel, exposures, and immune status. Empiric therapy should be tailored after cultures when possible.

title: Renal Pathology High-Yield
summary: Pattern recognition across nephritic and nephrotic syndromes.
body: Light microscopy findings combined with immunofluorescence narrow the differential. Pay attention to complement levels and systemic symptoms to distinguish lupus nephritis variants.
